amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.para: The term city as used in sections 19-601 to 19-648 includes any city having a population of one thousand or more and less than two hundred thousand.

annotation.para: The sections in this article relate to cities operating under the city manager plan. State ex rel. Warren v. Kleman, 178 Neb. 564, 134 N.W.2d 254 (1965).
